duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high-level technical guidance and support to customers, partnering with Account Manager to discover customer priorities and needs.
Recommend and develop appropriate customer solution offerings, and ensure customer success by leveraging Cisco and partner resources.
Engage in consultative fashion and act as an expert, or trusted technical adviser, by partners and customers.
Build relationships and discover opportunities across all relevant technology teams in a customer, identifying opportunities and defining solution options.

Articulate Cisco’s differentiation and the benefits of proposed solutions, develop and execute proof-of-concept/proof-of-value, and create a technical account plan while influencing the overall account plan.
Advocate for customers through adoption and operation of Cisco solutions.
Develop the technical relationship with customers and work as a Systems Engineer at Cisco.
Develop flexible and agile solutions that solve customers’ most complex issues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering/Computer Science or equivalent (Master's preferred)
